name: Healthyfied Glazed String Bean Mushroom
description: This Healthyfied Glazed String Bean Mushroom dish is perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. Combining the earthy flavors of mushrooms and fresh string beans with a hint of coconut amino for an irresistible glaze, this recipe is a testament to healthy eating without compromising on taste. Dive into this healthy culinary adventure and treat your tastebuds to a dish that's both nourishing and delicious.

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the ends of the Fresh String Beans and cut into desired lengths.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Clean the Mushrooms, enoki, raw by gently brushing off any dirt and trim the ends.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, bring water to a boil and blanch the string beans for 2 minutes, then quickly transfer them to an ice bath to stop the cooking process.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a skillet over medium heat and add the Coconut Amino, cooking for 1 minute to reduce slightly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blanched string beans and enoki mushrooms to the skillet. Season with ground Pepper, Thyme, fresh, and Oregano. Cook, stirring frequently, until the mushrooms are tender and the beans are glazed, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the glazed string bean and mushroom warm, garnished with additional fresh herbs if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
